contents.diploma: ServiceNow Certified Implementation Specialist – IT Service Management

info.text: The ServiceNow Certified Implementation Specialist – IT Service Management certifies that the owner has the skills and essential knowledge to contribute to the configuration, implementation, and maintenance of ServiceNow ITSM applications.

ITIL 4 Foundation certifies that the owner is able to look at IT Service Management through an end-to-end operating model for the creation, delivery and continual improvement of tech-enabled products and services.

details: The International English Language Testing System, or IELTS, is an international standardized test of English language proficiency for non-native English language speakers.
An IELTS result or Test Report Form is issued with a score from "band 1" ("non-user") to "band 9" ("expert user").

info.text: The ServiceNow Certified System Administrator certifies that the owner has the skills and essential knowledge necessary to manage the configuration, implementation, and maintenance of the ServiceNow platform.

contents.diploma: Agile Methodologies of Cloud Software Engineering
details: Understanding techniques for high quality software development, with emphasis on web application development and cloud computing applications.
Understanding software development tools utilized in the context of Deloitte activities.

info.text: Understanding software development techniques (Scrum, Kanban, Extreme Programming)
Learning software development tools (Java, HTML, CSS, Javascript)
Learning software control techniques (Selenium WebDriver, Cucumber BDD, JMeter, Maven)
Introduction to the concept of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) and the tools "Talend" & "Mulesoft"
